scripts.build: cd ferrum-db-server && dotnet publish --runtime linux-x64 -c Release --self-contained=true ferrum-db-server.csproj
scripts.build-debug: cd ferrum-db-server && dotnet publish --runtime linux-x64 -c Debug --self-contained=true ferrum-db-server.csproj
scripts.test: cd ferrum-db-server-tests && dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage"
scripts.build:admin: concurrently --names backend,frontend,shared,client "npm run build:admin:backend" "npm run build:admin:frontend" "npm run build:admin:shared" "npm run build:client:node"
scripts.build:admin:backend: cd ferrum-admin/server && npm i && tsc && nodemon -e mts --watch 'src/**/*.mts' --exec 'tsc && cd .. && npm run create:client && cd server && node .'
